changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO "user".roles (id, role, active, created, updated) SELECT gs AS id, CASE WHEN gs = 1 THEN 'USER' ELSE 'ADMIN' END AS role, true AS active, NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' - (random() * interval '365 days'), NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' FROM generate_series(1, 2) AS gs;

INSERT INTO "user".users (id, name, surname, age, username, password, user_role_id, active, created, updated) SELECT gs AS id, CONCAT('Name', gs) AS name, CONCAT('Surname', gs) AS surname, ROUND(random() * 100) AS age, CONCAT('User', gs) AS username, CONCAT('Qwe', gs) AS password, CASE WHEN random() < 0.5 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS user_role_id, true AS active, NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' - (random() * interval '365 days'), NOW() AT TIME ZONE 'utc' FROM generate_series(1, 10000) AS gs;
